name: Nopsy Chronicles: Knight Tale
description:
Controls

  • Movement: ← ↑ → ↓ / W, A, S, D
  • Interaction: Enter
  • Dynamite/Magic Stone (once available): Space
  • Rocket Shoes: R

Credits

  • Ingame assets can be displayed in the ingame infobox on the bottom right
  • Title background image by: Tamara Ramsay http://vectorgurl.com/
